The intern will get hands on experience on projects involving software development, technical support.     Desired Technical Skills:      Strong fundamentals of computer programming     Basic Web programming using HTML, CSS, JavaScript   Good understanding of relational database     Basic Linux commands     Education and Qualification:      Bachelors or higher degree in computer science or an engineering related field     0-1 years of experience in any internships, part-time job related to computer programming
